venue.address_2: AT south leaves from the right hand side of the road. Park in the parking lot across the bridge.
venue.name: Mt Cube Trailhead

item.description:
Mount Cube (~2,900'), with open ledges on its north and south peaks, commands views both back down the valley towards Hanover and ahead to Mount Moosilauke and the White Mountains beyond.

Mount Cube
Orford, NH
6.6 miles (~ 4.5 hours)
~2000' elevation gain; ~600'/mile
Meet at the trailhead parking lot at 10:00 am.

This is a dog-friendly hike.

How To Get There:
93N to exit 26-3A/25; 3A to 25 to 25A.
Just after crossing a steel highway bridge, 10.2 miles before Orford, the AT south leaves from the left hand side of the road. Park in the parking lot across the bridge. The lot is very small so you will most likely have to park on the side of the road.

Carpooling 8:30am at the park and ride off 93 exit 17.

All participants are required to read and agree to the waiver of liability posted on this site.
item.how_to_find_us: Pewter 2-door honda civic or a white Rav4.....cell number (603) 630-1260
item.name: Mt. Cube
